Cisco Board of Directors declares quarterly cash dividend$0.37 per common share to be paid on October 27, 2021 to all stockholders of record as of October 5, 2021Previous dividend of $0.37 per common share paid on July 28, 2021Cisco ( CSCO) announced that earlier today its Board of Directors declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.37 per common share to be paid on October 27, 2021, to all stockholders of record as of the close of business on October 5, 2021.
If you factor in 7% growth in EPS per year, Cisco will earn close to $5 a share by 2025. I see $100 share price by then, if not before.
